cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories

Class CategoryNameStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.categories.CategoryNameStats

  • public class CategoryNameStats
extends java.lang.Object
    This class computes the percentage of categories that are claimed to belong to a concrete domain from a category tree. In order to do so, the vocabulary of that category should be included. It can be generated with DomainKeywords TODO There is no cli: implement to make it as the other classes TODO Read statsFileName from config
    Author:
    jboldoba
    See Also:
    DomainKeywords
